overview: Located in the darkness, a place of no boundaries, Delilah is a 'meditation on violence', love and survival.  Interchangeable elements of the warrior, the Sorceress and the lover weave a ritual, creating a dialogue of forces that shifts boundaries. This conversation of gesture and sound moves through tension and release, power and abandon. "The outside is within us. You moved like a warrior but I could not hold you."
title: Delilah
